definition: to make a wish/to make a vow/to promise a reward
to offer official positions and material benefits in order to buy people's allegiance

sentences.english: Why don't you wish on the gargoyle?
sentences.chinese: 你不为什么不向怪兽的滴水嘴许愿？
许愿就是债，欠了不容赖。

sentences.english: Candle of the heart promising is only a comfort.
sentences.chinese: 燃一盏心灯，烛光下，明知道许愿只是一种安慰。
许愿就是债，欠了不容赖。

sentences.english: Full of hope, stand on tiptoe, twinkle star be able to touch.
sentences.chinese: 满满的心愿，踮起脚，闪烁的许愿星就能触到。

sentences.english: She looked at finally, make a vow tree, blood of her spatter everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 她最后看了一眼，许愿树上，她的鲜血溅得哪儿都是。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve Wishing Wall in New York.
sentences.chinese: 新年前夜纽约许愿墙五彩纷呈。

sentences.english: Time whenever makes a vow, I hope see wife's smiling face continuously.
sentences.chinese: 每当许愿之时，我都会许着希望一直看见老婆的笑容。

sentences.english: And then the children remembered that Martha couldn't see the wishes.
sentences.chinese: 于是孩子们记起马莎是看不出这些许愿的事的。

sentences.english: Rayburn: And they're gonna wish they never touched a hair on her head.
sentences.chinese: 他们会许愿他们从未碰过她一根头发。

sentences.english: Who in the world needs FAKE PLASTIC wishbones?
sentences.chinese: 世上谁会需要仿造的许愿骨头？

sentences.english: Your birthday wish new moon is on the 13th.
sentences.chinese: 你生日的许愿新月在13号降临。

sentences.english: Take time to wish upon a star .
sentences.chinese: 花一些时间向星星许愿吧。

sentences.english: Every stars a wishing star that shines for you.
sentences.chinese: 每一颗星星都是为你闪耀的许愿星。

sentences.english: Wishing upon a wishbone is an ancient custom.
sentences.chinese: 向如愿骨许愿是一项古老的习俗。

sentences.english: Patrick wishes for chewing gum for himself and the characters ended up eaten.
sentences.chinese: 派大星许愿让自己变成泡泡糖，最终所有人被吃掉。

definition: to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
to burn incense and worship Buddha
to redeem a vow (to a deity)/to fulfill a promise/votive
sky lantern (miniature hot-air balloon used during festivals)
